none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 27, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
A near hour of accordion drone, hesitant vocal trembles and tape hiss has never sounded so good. I got lost in this artist for a few hours upon accidental discovery, feel free to follow my lead. You don't listen to this tape as much as you sink into it, but I suggest you do both. Preferably alone. ANCIENT BASEMENT
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-cUkq9MflnUU/VCYp9DQWBpI/AAAAAAAAK1U/fLcYxuEmM_M/s1600/stephen%2Bbooth%2Bcover%2Bcopy.jpg //3.bp.blogspot.com/-OeLJMKw9HmU/VCYqU0izAzI/AAAAAAAAK1c/xRr56UFlSjI/s1600/stephen%2Bbooth%2Bimg%2Bcopy.jpg

seo.title: Stephen Booth - Ancient Basement - Terminal Escape
seo.description:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 27, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
A near hour of accordion drone, hesitant vocal trembles and tape hiss has never sounded so good. I got lost in this artist for a few hours upon accidental discovery, feel free to follow my lead. You don't listen to this tape as much as you sink into it, but I suggest you do both. Preferably alone. ANCIENT BASEMENT
